zero-to-hero.1: Register for an EPC Open Data account: https://epc.opendatacommunities.org/login
zero-to-hero.2: Copy this file to auth.json (remove '.template' from the file name). This is ignored by Git.
zero-to-hero.3: Replace the 'username' property in auth.json with the email you used to register.
zero-to-hero.4: Replace the 'password' property in auth.json with the API key that you will be emailed after registering.
